description:
An evening to enjoy, dance and journey to Higher Awareness!

Have you ever really danced freely? Have you ever danced just for the pleasure of dancing? Have you ever danced not bothering who is watching or who is not watching or if your moves are trendy? Have you ever danced with all your being, free without the help of substances such as alcohol? Have you ever danced meditatively and reach extasis? Have you ever danced in stillness?

If not this is your chance to do it!

In ancient times people learned to dance around fire and make their first journeys in to the worlds of spirits and the subtle worlds of energy. Together with this they discovered empowerment, inspiration and true joy! After having done these techniques people find immense wisdom and inspiration that arises from within connecting them to their higher selves and eternal consciousness. Come to learn about what it is to dance for the spirit and engage in entering your being with your dancing expression! In these 3 hours we will dance non stop, listening to modern music, we will let our bodies be expressed and release stress and anxiety without judgments, we will learn better our bodies and connect with them in a deeper level, we will be joyful and creative! Bring also your friends!

If you need to feel free this is the night for you! We will be expecting you all with love!

Please arrive 10 minutes before the event begins. For any further information please contact Alexander[masked] Artemis[masked]
name: TRANCE DANCE MEDITATION - "DANCE YOUR DANCE" FREE NIGHT!!!

description:
THE WORLD OF WISDOM & SPIRITUAL ADVENTURES presents a weekend workshop in Brussels

Dear Friends! Welcome to our awesome event!!!! :)

In this workshop we are going to practice different meditation techniques and practices that empower our being and develop our self esteem, personal power & our awareness in different levels in our lives. From Shamanistic Trance to Spiritual Theater we will explore ancient and modern ways of evolution of the inner energy of a human being and we will learn how to tap these hidden resources that can transform and boost our lives in the next level of development!!!

After these kind of seminars the life of people change a lot for the better and awareness starts flowing into your life!! Everyone is welcomed to participate and share him/herself with the group!!

The seminar will take place in an apt of Emine, friend and student of spirituality from turkey and member of this meetup as well. We will have a friendly environment were we will be sitting on a couches or chairs (or on the carpet) in the living room. We will have talks/presentations and discussion as well as practices and meditations to experience some things existentially.

Bring with you comfortable clothes for the practices and meditations.The facilitator is me Alexander (Northern deer) spiritual Teacher, Shaman & Healer. For more information you can check my website www.theworldofwisdom.org

AGENDA

SATURDAY

10 am-2pm PSYHOENERGETIC EMPOWERMENT & PROTECTION

2-3pm BREAK

3-7pm ESOTERIC ASTROLOGY & TAROT CARDS

SUNDAY

10am-2pm RELATIONSHIPS & MARRIAGE

2-3pm BREAK

3-7pm SHAMANISM'S ANCIENT TRADITIONS



• In the Psycho-energetic empowerment & Protection we will learn techniques and practices that protect a person from the external influences we receive in the every day life & in the social way of life. How to clean / cut energy attacks, how to manage stress and also ways of manipulation and behaviors that make a person to feel stressed especially in the level of business and in the workplace.

In the Esoteric Astrology we will also learn how the world influences us in a higher perspective. We will study the 4 levels of influences (social, energy types, influences of planets and direct influence of the cosmic flow of the Divine Prana (life force). Also we will direct the power of the Tarot towards our manifesting the dreams and destiny of our lives. We will understand how to create, put intention and use the tarot to develop our will consciousness and realization of Higher and Cosmic truths


The part of the Relationships will teach us different forms of "Marriage" and also ways to communicate with our beloved ones.
Finally the shamanic traditions will help us tap into the "worlds of dreams", this sphere of our existence where everything starts and from where everything is manifested.


All these topics will be explained and we will have practice following the theoretical part as well.

In order to participate please write to [masked] saying that you want to take part in the workshop or call Alexander in 0032 (0)[masked] in Belgium ( if you are calling from another country do not put the zero in the parenthesis).

The energetic exchange to participate in the event is 125 €

Also there is a possibility for this event to participate in one of its parts only. For participating in one day the price is 65 euro. For one module (one topic - 4 hours) the price is 35 euro. 

The whole seminar lasts 8 hours per day with an 1 hour break in the middle for lunch.

Also it is held in english language

If you have any questions feel free to ask via email or tel

We will be happy to meet you in person!

The Blessings of Life to be with you!!

Namaste!!
name: A WEEKEND OF MANIFESTATION - Weekend workshop for re-arranging your life!!

description:
Hello Dear friends! Come & participate in this meditation + dancing and learn how to shift your energy and your attention to different energetic points of perception acquiring power and developing your awareness!!

 

In this meditation we will dance through different chakras and you will earn how to develop yourself energetically.

Also after the meditation dance there will be some time for exchange our experience, ask questions etc.

This meditation is for everyone. You do not have to have previous experience of meditation, dancing or having any special dancing skills!

After this practice you will experience strong energy into your body, special feelings of inner empowerment, inspiration and elevated inner state. Also you will understand how to develop different aspects of your life that correspond to the energy centers chakras.

This is not a common practice and you will not find it in books that talk about chakras and meditation.

if you want to heal your physical and energetic bodies, release yourself from psychological tiredness and stress, better your life and your relationships, find true answers for your life and acquire personal power just try our meditation technique!

PLEASE COME 10 MIN BEFORE THE EVENT IN ORDER TO START ON TIME & NOT HAVE INTERUPTIONS.

WEAR COMFORTABLE CLOTHES

5 EURO SUGGESTED DONATION

FOR ANY INFORMATION CALL ALEXANDER  [masked]

description:
Hello Dear friends! We are out of Belgium for March so i wanted to communicate to you some kind of knowledge that i believe is very important for everybody's life! 

Join us to this online live meeting where we will discuss one of the most important topics of all: why do we suffer from illnesses and what can we do to live up to our standards of health and happiness. This event is going to take place via USTREAM program on the internet. There will be a discussion and a meditation and also some time where you can write your questions.

In order to participate you only have to go to the following link which is our Ustream channel:

http://www.ustream.tv/channel/school-of-wisdom-spiritual-adventure

When you are linked just wait for the meeting to start. This is a live event and you will be able to write some questions if you want.

See you there!

Alexander - Northern Deer

description:
Dear friends! Come the upcoming Sunday April 13 for a walk in the forest with practice for emotional and energetic empowerment that will give you a lot of power and energy and will uplift your spirit for the next of the week after for sure! Come and learn how to protect your energy and enjoy the nature and the walk in the beautiful surroundings! We will also do special meditations while walking from shamanic traditions and a ritual for psycho-energetic empowerment! We are waiting for you with happiness and love! Namaste!

We will meet in the HERRMANN- DEBROUX metro station, outside. If you cannot find us for some reason or you are confused or little late (please only little late!) call Alexander in [masked] 925.

We will be happy to meet you for a great spiritual practice and experience!

There is a cost of 8 euro for participation.

www.theworldofwisdom.org

We will explain how to use this divination tool into your life how to tune into the cards and use them for the best benefit and outcome in your life!

The Participation fee is 25 euro

name: Sunday Morning Practices for Empowerment in the Forest

description:
Dear Friends !

For the people who are interested in the shamanistic way of life and experience. This is a workshop that will teach you the very basic to begin and understand how the shamans function. These traditions come from very ancient times from the central part of Asia in Southern Siberia.

We will start by going to the Forest where we are going to explain the general realization and way of the shamans and we will talk about the shamanistic Cosmology and how to develop the basic ground for personal evolution.

We will explain the world of dreams and the different souls of a man.

Also we will have some techniques to develop the energy of the soul Kut one of the basic ingredient to start building your personal power and your way in this knowledge

After that we will return to the city and we will have a shamanistic "journey"  - ritual with the drum where you will experience the central and more important ritual in this tradition, which in Siberian tradition is called "kamlanie" in which the soul can experience deep transformation and realization of the Higher Destiny

We are happy to open step by step this knowledge and develop in this beautiful yet powerful path of the shaman.

May the spirits direct you in this path

Alexander - (Northern Deer)

                                                               PROGRAM

10:00 - 13:30 - Practices in the Forest

13:30 - 14:30 Moving back to the city (Dahlia's Workshop Place - 38 rue de pervyse 1040 Brussels, Brussels, be) - Lunch Break

14:30 - 17:00 - Shamanistic Journey - Ritual with the drum (kamlanie)


Please bring with you your own food, water etc.

Participation fee: 40 euro
how_to_find_us: We will meet in the Entrance of the Metro Station Herman Debroux - Next to the Shell Gas Station
name: Shamanic Traditions - Experience the World of Shamanistic Journeys

description:

I invite you to this event on Sunday June 15 in the Park/Forest where we will discuss and practice for around 4 hours many interesting things including shamanism & Relationships (Tantra). Come to learn how to raise your vibration, empower yourself, develop your inherent abilities and create the harmony that you deserve in your life.

The donation (price) for this workshop is 25 euro

We will be waiting for you with Joy and Love!
Namaste!
Northern Deer - Spiritual Teacher - Shaman & Healer

description:
Hello Dear friends!
In this meeting we are going to discuss the meaning of Dharma - the individual path in life - what is our nature and how to understand what our personal path is.
We will see according to ancient shamanic truths and traditions how to work with ourselves to discover if we are going in the right path for us or not. This topic is very important and deep. So bring with you your best self and desire to learn!!
We will do exercises and meditations. bring with your also paper and pencil.

The participation fee is 30 €


Also you can bring with you some lunch as we will be meeting at an hour which is usually lunch time


See you there!
Alexander
name: Dharma: The 4 purposes of life

description:
Dear Friends!

How many times did you have the opportunity for a night walk in the forest, especially while living in the city?

Brussels is a vivid, yet buzzing, noisy, ever growing capital city with stressful daily rhythms for its citizens.

Have you ever imagined that just 15 min by metro from the city center you can enjoy a night walk in the forest, see many fireflies and also connect to the spirits of nature and live in the magic of
the night inside a forest?

For many of us this might sound something taken out of a movie!

But you will just need a flash light and an adventurous and open spirit to live this experience just 15 from Brussels center!!!

 

 

We invite you to participate in this event for awakening the powers of the Nagual! .... What is this?

Nagual, according of the Toltect traditions is the power of the Universe that is the creative but invisible flow that creates all situations, events and life itself, permeates everything and is the root of all happenings.

Using modern psychological terms this is the subconscious mind which is ever present in all our decisions, which colors our actions, thoughts and emotions but we are unaware of its existence and function. This is why it is called subconscious

Nagual is the deep layers of our soul which is uncharted and not discovered yet and which we are very much afraid to see, to face and contact because we are afraid to change and lose the old patterns, the known.

Contacting the Nagual brings inner security and comfort that comes from being confident.


 

Come and join us as we will travel through the forest at night and we will open the powers of the Nagual.

After this experience you will feel much more alive, calm and secure within you and you will start having more intuitive guidance from the Whole!

The event lasts approx. 3 hours.

The participation is 20 euro

BRING WITH YOU FLASH LIGHT!!!

IMPORTANT INFO!! (Because the practice will finish at 01:00 am you will need to return to your home with your own means - There is no Metro at that hour. THERE IS though night BUS next to Metro station - Bus No 9 - which leaves at: 01:09, 01:39 and 02:09 . The most possible to catch is the 01:39 but is possible also the 01:09. Don't worry we will manage the time in order to arrive few minutes earlier to one of the night busses so you will not also have to wait for along time to leave)

CLICK HERE FOR INFO ABOUT THE BUS

With love, joy and happiness!

Namaste!
how_to_find_us: We will meet outside the metro station Herman Debroux infront of the exit which is next to the Shell gas station.  ( in any case my tel number is 0486 325 925)                                     www.theworldofwisdom.org
name: Awaken The Powers of the Nagual! Shamanic Journey at night in the Forest!!

description:
Hello dear friends!!
We invite you (although last minute) in Cinquantenaire park to exercise psycho-energetic techniques for empowerment and opening of our energy channels
We all have an etheric and vital energy bodies inside which there are many energetic channels. The flow of energy in these channels and the capacity of these channels are very important for our self confidence, (yes you read right!), health and the overall wellbeing. By this understanding from ancient times many methods were developed to train the energetic bodies and keep the channels (also known as chinese meridians) open and in good condition - meaning the energy flows freely in them).

So come and train with us to acquire self confidence power and health!

bring your friends with you!

Wear cozy clothes ( you don't need a yoga mat - only if you want for yourself - the practices are in standing position) - also bring water

We are waiting for you!

Namaste

Alexander (Northern Deer)

Spiritual teacher, Shaman & Healer

venue.name: Park Cinquantenaire - opposite main entrance to the Musées Royaux d'Art et d'Histoire

name: FREE - OPEN ENERGETIC EXERCISES IN THE PARK - A PRACTICE FOR EVERYONE!!

description:
7 Days In Nature, in the Most Powerful Place of Greece!  - https://www.smore.com/up8cf

Dear Friends~!

We are happy to announce the Summer Trip to Olympus - Spiritual Retreat - that you were all waiting with enthusiasm!

In the period between August 3 – August 9 you will have the most powerful and transformational retreat you could ever imagine which will help you relax, empower yourself and find new inspiration and understanding for your life!

We will be swimming, hiking, meditating & doing lots of practices, experiencing deep inner states of wonder and beauty!

Today, although modern civilization has given to us many gifts of the technological achievements, it has simultaneously disconnected us from our body, natural instincts and the source of power, intrinsic inside the center of our being.

In this retreat we are going to reunite with this beauty and power that we all have inside!!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xfxYIi_sgkA

In these 7 beautiful and blissful days we will hike and dance, experience joy and blissfulness, together with exotic and panoramic views of marvelous places in Olympus mountain and Aegean sea In Greece. We will swim in the mountain rivers and in the sea, under waterfalls and in beautiful natural pools! We will have a lot of practices to experience higher and altered states of consciousness which will help us to understand and see the world , ourselves and our lives in new ways and with a new , rejuvenated intention to create a new and a happier Future! Come for this summer and join us to this universal experience that you will never forget !

FOR INFORMATION ABOUT THE PROGRAM AND HOW TO PARTICIPATE GO TO THE LINK:  https://www.smore.com/up8cf

2 DAYS OF PRACTICES NEAR THE SEA - 5 DAYS PILGRIMAGE - HIKE TO THE TOP OF OLYMPUS - WHERE GODS LIVE!!
name: OLYMPUS SUMMER RETREAT 2014!!! - NATIONAL INTERNATIONAL SEMINAR - Greece 3-9 AUG

description:
Dear Friends! Welcome to our spiritual practice/adventure in the Park/Forest (Foret de Soignes). We will be practicing very interesting topics like spiritual warrior's meditation and energy exercises for personal power, shamanic journey and a new practice for accumulating the energy from the past.
We will start early in the morning to accumulate enough energy transformation and make changes for our lives. We will hike as well to enjoy the nature. Prepare to have launch or breakfast with you cause we are going to spend some time in the forest so at some point you will get probably hungry!
The practices come form ancient traditions, civilizations of the past like shamanic traditions, yoga, Astrological esoteric knowledge etc.
Be ready for another transformational adventure!!

PROGRAM:

• Spiritual Esoteric Philosophy of Martial Arts

• Shamanic Journey (with Drum) - Spirit helpers

• Money and accumulating programs of society - how to get rid of social conditioning regarding that

• Planetary types - How to understand which type you are and how can you transform in your life using this type of spiritual knowledge!

COST: 40 €

PARTICIPATION:  In Order to register please contact us in the email [masked] - We have limited space up to 20 people.

If you bring your friends you have discount - contact us for details!

BRING WITH YOU WATER, YOUR SMILE  AND YOUR OPEN HEART!!

WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU FOR ANOTHR ADVENTURE IN THE PARK /FOREST WITH LOVE!!

NAMASTE!
name: New Adventures in the Park! - Spiritual Meetup / Seminar

description:
The Shamanic School for Evolution of Consciousness is Beginning! We are waiting for you in this online presentation where we will talk about the plans of our school for the new year and how is better to evolve spiritually in our modern times. More specifically we will present you the plans of the Shamanic School that is starting from this month, how it is going to help individuals to understand their higher purpose and engage in life with strength, confidence and happiness and how one can participate and become member of this school and the shamanic society that we are starting together with it!
The event is taking place at 8:00PM Brussels (Belgium) time (or 9:00PM Greece & Romania time - 7:00PM UK time)

In order to participate in the online presentation you just need to go to this link: http://www.ustream.tv/channel/school-of-wisdom-spiritual-adventure

and wait for the presentation to start!

There will be also opportunity to write your questions in the chat box and receive the live answer For more information you can contact us via email [masked]

We will be happy to see you Friday evening!!

Be always happy!

Namaste!
name: USTREAM LIVE - ONLINE PRESENTATION OF THE SHAMANIC SCHOOL

description:
We post here some information but please go to this link: https://www.smore.com/c2u6c to see the complete information about the Shamanic School Online that starts in few days!!

We are looking forward to meet you in person!!!

Namaste

Alexander - Northern Deer  (Spiritual Teacher, Shaman & Healer)

The Shamanic School - Online - is starting soon!!

Hello Dear Friends!

Welcome to The Shamanic School - This is an evolutionary process, a next step into your development. This school is created for you who want to go deeper into your inquiry for evolution of consciousness and understand yourself in a deeper level.

In times of crisis in all levels, emotional, financial and spiritual, we all have the opportunity to take the life situations into our hands and instead of decline, rise above adversities , difficulties and stress!!

In order to do this one has to understand where inside of him/her exist the intrinsic power that one was born with! The Shamanic Power!

A Shaman has the inner freedom and will to take life as a canvas and create beauty, happiness and Love, inner freedom and a concrete life - the life of his/her dreams!!

The Shamanic School will help you to become healthier, more confident, with better relationships, a strong will and less ego!

If you are ready lets get going!!



More information

The Shamanic School has 2 parts:

A.)ONLINE MEETINGS

B.)LIVE SEMINARS

Go To: http://www.ustream.tv/user/schoolofwisdom and watch the online live presentation of the shamanic school that was held at Friday Sept[masked]

The Online meetings have the purpose to prepare people for psychological work, necessary for the more demanding shamanic development.

In these meetings there will be teachings and practices for people to do until the next time.

There will be 2 meetings each month:

First meeting is opening of a topic and presentation of the relevant teaching

Second meeting - Discussion of the results of the practice & feedback of people's experience
name: Shamanic School Online!!

description:
Our special day is coming soon!

CLICK THIS LINK FOR OUR ONLINE COMPLETE FLYER OF THE EVENT: https://www.smore.com/4b2av

Hello Dear friends!

•Do you feel emotionally drained in your relationships and/or in your everyday life?
•Do you understand who your "partner" is and who "you" are in your relationships?
•Do you want to become healthier and release accumulated stress and tension?
•Do you want to master your personal power and self-confidence?
•Do you want to attract abundance and creativity and learn how to transform different life situations?

Then...

Join us in this special workshop in order to learn ancient techniques and unique meditations that will help you take control of the most important areas of your life: personal power and self-confidence, relationships, health and emotional awareness.

Learn how to love yourself and communicate with others in a healthier and more balanced way. Transform your emotions and live your life as you've always wanted! Touch the innermost centre of your being through a magical dance-shamanic meditation! " Understand your Relationships - Transform your Life!! "

When
Saturday, Sep. 27th, 3-9pm Where


Colectivo Garcia Lorca, 47/49, Rue de Foulons, 1000 Brussels ( http://www.garcialorca.be/node/38 ) More information


The event consists of 3 parts/practices. You can participate in the whole event or choose one or two practices. Participation fee for each practice: 20 euro Participation in the whole event: 50 euro

Make sure that you wear comfortable clothes and that you come in with a big smile!!! Get Directions La salle de danse | www.garcialorca.be www.garcialorca.be

Agenda

3:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Astral Karate, an inner path to personal power and self-confidence. We will do practices and meditation of this unique esoteric way of martial arts (theory & practice)

5:00 pm - 7:00 pm: Psycho-energetic theatre and Tantric meditation for a deeper understanding of relationships. (theory & practice)

7:00 pm - 9:00 pm: Trance Dance Shamanic Meditation, a path to finding your centre and connecting with the creative Universal powers you were born with. - This is a practice of dancing using also shamanic drumming where you are going to learn to explore your inner world through dance!

- There will be 15-minute tea breaks in-between practices.
name: Understand your Relationships - Transform your Life!!

description:
(For those who are going to come by Metro we will be back to the metro station 10 min before 12:00pm so you can catch the last Metro back)

Dear Friends, This Wednesday Oct 8 we are going to participate in a ceremony in the forest for healing our purposes from the past memories (heavy energies) and receive a spiritual cleansing during the period of the October full Moon. This Full Moon in some shamanic tribes is called the Hunter's Moon because from this period started the hunting. It also signifies the period for setting targets, putting goals and start your "hunting period" in every endeavor in your life!
Come and join us to receive healing and information about your future, connect with shamanic spirits for health, empowerment, better relationships and abundance in this ceremony that will last approx. 2 hours.
This Full Moon though is more important and for another reason. There is also a total eclipse of the moon that is happening the same day (in Brussels is happening around noon of Oct 8)
The total eclipse represents a time where the portal of the subconscious will be "locked" for a while and people will have a chance to look deeper in to the reasons of their beliefs and inspirations or sufferings. You can have a chance to make deep changes in your life at this time (if you are ready and willing). So join us for a deep spiritual transformational shamanic ritual with the drum and the tarot cards!

Participation cost 20 euro - For the intention
Bring with you warm clothes and flash light!

See you soon!! (under the moon)

Alexander - Northern Deer

Self Development Coach - Healer & Educator in Family, Business & Life Management
how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance of Herman Debroux Metro (next to the Shell gas station).  My tel is 0486 325 925. call if you cannot find me - Alexander  - If you come by Metro: We will be back to the metro station at 23:50 so you can catch the last one
name: Full Moon & Total Eclipse Of The Moon Ceremony - In The Forest De Soignes

In these meetings there will be teachings and practices for people to do until the next time.

There will be 2 meetings each month:

First meeting is opening of a topic and presentation of the relevant teaching

Second meeting - Discussion of the results of the practice & feedback of people's experience

name: Shamanic School Online!!

description:
Welcome to all the adventurous souls, dreamers, travelers and friends!

The Travel Capsule is the "birth" of the free spirit, the adventurous soul and of a mind with the motto "I am realistic - I expect miracles to happen". Nothing is impossible at this realm and the greatest adventures always begin from within us!

The Travel Capsule is created to give us the opportunity to see nature's and this world's most beautiful places and phenomenon and to get the chance to enjoy and connect with pure nature and other people, to contemplate about life's miracle and infinite possibilities and to experience the unity that exists in this world and of course the most important to have an adventure!!

This December 2014 the "Travel Capsule" will teleport us to the magical Finish Lapland to witness nature's most sensational light show, the Northern Lights or else known as Aurora Borealis!

Important:Please take the time to read all of the information provided in the flyer.

https://www.smore.com/8g3md-aurora-borealis-magical-adventure
----------------------------------------------------------------------
The Travel adventure in a nutshell!

What? Adventure travel to hunt Aurora Borealis or else known as Northern Lights, winter activities (huski safari, Aurora camp, Aurora hunting with snowmobiles, energetic practices, astrological prediction, sauna, massages)

When? 12th December 2014 - 15th December 2014

Where? Finish Lapland, Saariselkä, Finland

How? The closest airport is Ivalo airport, Finland, from there the hotel service will transfer us to the hotel.

Cost? Standard packets plus airplane tickets
name: AURORA BOREALIS MAGICAL ADVENTURE !!!
